item.title: Vue 8
item.description: echart图表相关 把echart表弄成组件，方便管理 <template> <div> <div class="dashboard-container"> <puv-chart :chart-data="chartData" /> <el-row class="mt"> <el-col :span="12"> //equ-chart =equChart <equ-chart :chart-data="equipmentData" /> </el-col> <el-col :span="12"> <ori-chart :chart-data="originData" /> </el-col> </el-row> </div> </div> </template> <script> //导出插件 import puvChart from './components/puv' import equChart from './components/equipment' import oriChart from './components/origin' import dateFormat from '@/utils/dateFormat' export default { name: 'Dashboard', components: { puvChart, equChart, oriChart }, data() { return { chartData: {}, equipmentData: {}, originData: {}, oriTable: [] } }, methods: { // 接口 setDate() { const _query = JSON.
